Jeff,
Do you know what the paranormal puck is? Is it the same thing?
How di=
d you know about this Ovilus 1 before it was on Paranormal State?
Do- you -=
know-someone? Or are you involved in the making of this?
And what NEW TOYS =
are out there that we don't know about?
I have alot of questions don't I ? =
Can't help it........
You can sell it on ebay...... Why would you want to g=
et rid of it
though, if it
works?

________________________________

From: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
Of Marlb=
oro63@...
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 12:30 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus



Hi Elabeth,
 
You have to remem=
ber much of what the Ovilus 1 said probably ended up on
the editing room fl=
oor.  But it does work.  I get great responses from
mine.  The (7) differen=
t modes on it work very well.  But if you know
anyone who wants one please =
let me know.  I was informed I have to sell
some of my toys to afford to bu=
y new toys...LOLOL  I would sell it for
$165.00 and it is in brand new cond=
ition and only used a few times.
 
Jeff
 
In a message dated 8/12/2008 11:2=
4:20 A.M. Central Standard Time,
elabeth@... writes:

	

	I thought i=
t was pretty neat that it repeated the word "worry"
when
	Ryan asked if it =
was worried they'd bring in a priest.
	What are the odds of that just based=
 on environmental readings?
If I
	had an extra $200 laying around I'd be bu=
ying myself one to play
with.
	~Elabeth
	
	On Tue, Aug 12, 2008 at 7:41 AM,=
 Fransen, Debbie
	<debbie.fransen@... <mailto:debbie.fransen%40delta.=
com> >
wrote:
	> I don't know how many of the members watch Paranormal Stat=
e,
but they used
	> a new piece of equipment called The Ovilus. You guys ha=
ve got
to check this
	> out. Go to www.digitaldowsing.com. I am not really =
sure who
these guys are,
	> and
	> where they came up with this. To me, it =
sounds kind of like
Frank's Box, but
	> not the same.
	> Frank, please take=
 a look at this, and tell us what you think.
	> I don't understand how it w=
orks......
	> Deb
